Posts.Content: Hi everyone can anyone help me, I finished my radiotherapy 4weeks ago and from about mid treatment I have had a stabbing pain in my opposite shoulder to treatment, my Gp said it is muscular but it is not going away, I cannot put any weight on or use this arm much, has anyone experienced the same?
Posts.Title: Pain in opposite shoulder

Posts.Content: Hi ladies Has anyone experienced the above, I have been given a zoladex injection as my breast cancer was hormone fed, I have been experiencing some severe joint pain in my shoulder and elbow, wrist and knuckle of my right arm my gp has given me painkillers but they do not help very much.
Posts.Title: Zoladex and joint pain
